original_title: Playboy: The Girls of Hawaiian Tropic, Naked in Paradise
overview: Celebrated winners of the world's most renowned bikini contest, Hawaiian Tropic's Super Models are legendary for their golden-brown tans, fabulous figures and radiant smiles.  And now, for the first time ever, they remove their trademark swimsuits in sensual adventures guaranteed to give you "island heat." From thousands of gorgeous hopefuls in international competitions, Playboy has selected our very own "Dream Team" to star in this exclusive video spectacular, filmed entirely on location in the lush Hawaiian islands and featuring stunning nude escapades.
title: Playboy: The Girls of Hawaiian Tropic, Naked in Paradise
